jishoData.meaning: fall in love with, admire, grow senile

kunyomiExamples.reading: to grow senile, to be childish with age, to be mentally slow, to be befuddled, to play stupid, to say something stupid (oft. on purpose; esp. as part of a comedic routine)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to fall in love (with), to fall for, to become enamored (with), to be taken (with), to be attracted (by), to be charmed (by), to be captivated (by), to be impressed (by), to admire, to forget oneself, to be entranced (by)
